website_summaries.verdict: An affordable option and a gentle formula featuring 96% naturally derived ingredients; ideal for sensitive skin.
pros: Vegan formula is residue-free and leaves skin feeling soft and supple
Free of parabens, dyes, silicones, and sulfates
A little goes a long way, so the bottle lasts a while
Great for those with oily skin and rosacea
cons: Doesn’t smell like rose, and some buyers voice quality concerns about the way the pump is attached

customer_reviews.title: I so wanted to like this item--and I do, but...
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this cleanser, but unfortunately that's not the case. The cleanser doesn't foam, but is a slight gel/cream consistency. It's useful after a more intensive facial cleanse. This rinse leaves the skin buttery soft and moisturized, though. However, it fails to meet some of the product claims. Good product, but I'm unable to use it for its intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: SHOE ADDICT 1982

customer_reviews.title: Great for my combination skin!
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this cleanser at first. It never makes me feel squeaky clean. But after using it for a month I have realized that stripping all the oil out of your face does far more damage than good. 10 minutes after washing my face it feels clean and not nearly as tight and itchy as my old cleansers did. I live it and it has made a huge improvement to my skin. I would definitely recommend to all, even to those with oily complexions.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for oily leaning combination skin in the winter
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't lather but it works great to help remove makeup (though you'll definitely need micellar water to finish getting the rest of the remaining makeup off if you've got waterproof anything on). Very lightly scented, I haven't been breaking out as much but my skin is super finicky, definitely needs to be paired with a moisturizer. I have combination oily leaning sensitive skin
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Intoxicating
customer_reviews.text: First of all this product smells absolutely amazing, I can’t get enough of it! Secondly I barely use any and it takes my makeup off with out any issues, even my mascara (I do not use waterproof-so I don’t know how it would work on that). My face feels so clean, hydrated and fresh. Absolutely love it and will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Lewandowski

customer_reviews.title: Slathery mess
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to try a different moisturing face wash. As a guy with top oily skin, this is terrible. The scent is cheap and unpleasant to smell. Barely any cleaning is done, And worst of all this leaves a disgusting and hard to remove layer of oilyness on my face and hands. This is going straight to the trash, not worth keeping around.
customer_reviews.author: re sig

customer_reviews.title: Favorite facial cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cleanser. It's a smooth lotion with a light pleasant rose scent that doesn't dry out my skin (especially important in winter!), yet doesn't irritate it or cause outbreaks. I am in my 60's with an oily T-zone (forehead, nose, chin), but my cheeks can get dry. This cleanser is excellent for complexions with combination skin, such as mine. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne H

customer_reviews.title: Very good bang to buck ratio
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolute steal for ~$5. It smells AMAZING and does the job. However it's obviously not as nice as higher end milk cleansers that I'm used to, and I'm not convinced it's appropriate for sensitive skin either. But for the price it's perfect and you can't expect more really. If you're considering switching to a milk cleanser this may be a good introductory product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Nice gentle facial cleanser especially good for the summer months ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice gentle facial cleanser especially good for the summer months or the year round warm weather here in the South. Love the fragrance too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Jarrett

customer_reviews.title: amazing for the price
customer_reviews.text: I love this face wash. I thought I'd try it because it was so cheap, and it's so great. it smells so good not too artificial, it actually is really nice on my sensitive skin, and has done its job and helped with the little bit of acne I get. Also on the bottle it says that you are supposed to use it on dry skin, but I typically use it after I've gotten out of the shower, I apply it with my hands or with my silicon face massager/cleanser thing, and then wipe it off with a wet washcloth
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Extremely potent smell
customer_reviews.text: The only plus of this product is that it doesn't strip the skin and doesn't leave it too squeaky clean (which is what I want). However, I didn't find it hydrating or calming to my skin. I think it comes down to the fragrance in this product. The amount of fragrance, which I suspect has alcohol, completely undoes the potential moisturizing benefits of this cleanser. After using, I've found that my face has some dry patches that weren't there before. I suspect that this cleanser is the culprit. The fragrance is extremely strong and lingers even after rinsing it off. Such a shame. I will never be purchasing from this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Marissa F

customer_reviews.title: Works great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Its more like a face cream/ lotion. It doesn’t bubble up like a soap. Aside from that it works well for dry skin, also skin with acne I noticed that my sister skin really cleared up.
customer_reviews.author: ixzel Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this to be that great. I have sensitive skin, but still need to wash my face and remove my makeup. This stuff is wonderful. It removes my makeup, leaves my skin very clean, and extra soft.
customer_reviews.author: L. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Wife hated it
customer_reviews.text: The scent is good and everything but it gets sticky too fast. Made her skin breakout and is very sticky to use.
customer_reviews.author: Anees

customer_reviews.title: Gentle yet Effective - and smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: I have the sensitive skin of an Irish redhead, and this face wash cleans without drying and leaves a soft finish without feeling greasy. And I love the scent! Yesterday I purchased the matching face moisterizer gel with rose water and hope it is as wonderful as this cleanser!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Thomas

customer_reviews.title: 10 stars!
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive skin. After spending a fortune for years on name brand depaetment store skin care lines, this line of Garnier SkinActive products with Rose water has been the best I have ever used. Highly recommend this skin care.
customer_reviews.author: Siam

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove any thing.
customer_reviews.text: This does not remove one drop of makeup, it has a heavy oil base so you don’t feel dried out after washing your face. I would not recommend, sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Smells just like roses
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I was looking for a milky cleanser, and found one with my favorite scent. Price and quality are good. I have to use a little more product than I’d like to, but overall it’s a wonderful product.
customer_reviews.author: Charisse

customer_reviews.title: No Foam
customer_reviews.text: I know cleansing milk is not meant to create foams. But, it does not even create mild foam. If you do not feel your face is clean without a foaming based wash, it is not for you. I would stick to the Green Tea cleanser. That has 1% more organic ingredients than this. Also, that cleans the face thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Nahnah

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly suprised
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was buying a soapy face wash. I wasn't paying close attention when ordering so when it arrived I was disappointed to see it was Rose Milk. I tried it anyway and I love it! I am pleasantly surprised and will purchase this again. My face is clean and soft with no oily feeling. Perfect for before bed facial cleaning or those mornings when you don't have time to shower. Love this product!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my skin feel amazing. I have combination skin and it works well for both the oily and dry areas of myagain. It has no problem removing my makeup. It has a very light pleasant smell. I will buy this product again and agsin.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Saltsgiver

customer_reviews.title: Leaves your face soft!
customer_reviews.text: I normally don’t like cream face washes but I bought this because it’s rose scented. The scent is faint and it washes off cleanly but leaves my skin feeling VERY SOFT! Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Grandma S

customer_reviews.title: Ok for occasional use.
customer_reviews.text: its ok but doesn’t give much true moisture. It says to put it on thick n let it sit for a bit and then wipe off excess. But afterwards it doesn’t really feel truly hydrated. But it could just be me.
customer_reviews.author: Yoki

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells good, moisturizing, leaves face feeling soft. Is NOT good at washing off makeup, so I usually just use it in the morning when I’m not wearing any. Also I have combination skin.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watered up product
customer_reviews.text: This product could have did so much better. I tend to buy products for sensitive skin. This product comes out like water and i had a break put after
customer_reviews.author: OrdinaryRi

customer_reviews.title: This gives my skin life!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product! I wanted to try another cleanser other than my regular soap and I am forever grateful I tried this! A little goes a long way! My skin felt so smooth and soft after my first use today! I received it on time and I will definitely purchase this again!
customer_reviews.author: Lakeidra

customer_reviews.title: NON FOAM
customer_reviews.text: I missed the description that this was not a foaming cleanser. I don't like it for that reason. I gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: nancy gagnier

customer_reviews.title: it is not what i thought
customer_reviews.text: i like that it is moisturizing but it is not that bubbly it was like a lotion i washed my face it was not like my other face washes it is ok but not for a face wash to clean your face in the morning and the night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this! I have combination skin. My chin and forehead are usually very oily and my cheeks super dry. I highly recommend this and will definitely be purchasing it again!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Face wash does not remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this. But it does not remove makeup well even after repeating 2-3 times. Others in the same price bracket are much better if you are cleansing more than a bare face.
customer_reviews.author: sumanness

customer_reviews.title: Smells lovely,  but itsnt actually sudsy like most cleansers.
customer_reviews.text: I really really wanted to love this. Its labeled as a cleanser, but it doesnt lather or feel like a cleanser. Its more like a shower moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Woodruff

customer_reviews.title: Gentle refreshing face wash
customer_reviews.text: I am not usually a fan of rose but this is pleasant and the cleanser if smooth and refreshing to use. I will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Great for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I’ve noticed a lot more moisture. My skin doesn’t feel super clean after I use it, and that took some getting used to, but I really do like it!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Jennings

customer_reviews.title: feels oily
customer_reviews.text: this face wash smells good but feels weirdly oily. I had to return it because after each use I felt like my face is oily! this might work well for very dry skins though.
customer_reviews.author: Negar Khojasteh

customer_reviews.title: I do not like it
customer_reviews.text: Look at the slogan is cleansing cream, but it feels like lotion and bubble. It's not what I want.
customer_reviews.author: Yuhua Wang

customer_reviews.title: I really like this product
customer_reviews.text: thank you very much, I really like this product, it has good quality and price, I enjoy when I use it, but I use it every day
customer_reviews.author: Ruslan I. Kovalenko

customer_reviews.title: Not foamy
customer_reviews.text: I really love the scent but i also really thought it was a soapy cleanser , and its not it feels like washing my face with lotion. I use it only for the morning to wash off any serums and creams of the night.
customer_reviews.author: amhy01Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell..
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell but leaves an oily residue on my skin. Will use it regardless. Let's see what it does for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisette

customer_reviews.title: Good but
customer_reviews.text: I love this face cleaner. Did not break out face
customer_reviews.author: TLM

customer_reviews.title: For Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: Only for dry skin. Like mine in winter time. Won’t work for me in summer. Need more drying agent
customer_reviews.author: moonlight_50

customer_reviews.title: Sometimes the “cheaper” brand is better!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite wash! I used to spend $40+ on luxury brands until I found this wash. It cleanses, moisturizes and preps skin for makeup or moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: Bo bisti

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love!
customer_reviews.text: So soft and smells amazing! It doesn’t leave any waxy residue which is what I why I switched to this! Highly recommend!! ⭐️
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Cleanser does not remove any makeup
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser does not remove any makeup, rather it spreads eyeliner and mascara all over your face. However, if your face is already clean this is a great cleanser as it does not dry out your skin. I only use this cleanser in the morning and I love it because its very moisturizing and smells great. If purchasing do not use at night to take off makeup
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much to say
customer_reviews.text: It's mediocre. Seems to do what it's supposed to, just doesn't feel great.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Love this product good for morning 😊 leave skin really soft and moisturizer.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product, I used on the morning 😊 leave my skin really soft and moisturizer... I will buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Emilia R.

customer_reviews.title: Damage in the pump
customer_reviews.text: The delivery is ok. But the person package the product don't protected and the pump comes broke.. I keep it a switch to different bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes tour skin look fluffier!
customer_reviews.text: I look two years younger using this product it’s a must have!
customer_reviews.author: Laura mabelitini

customer_reviews.title: My dream face wash
customer_reviews.text: This is the face wash I've been looking for all my life. It actually gives your skin moisture because it's a lotion. It's amazing. I want to wash my face all day just to feel my face afterwards and smell the beautiful scent.
customer_reviews.author: Trejon booker

customer_reviews.title: fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Lovely smell. Read directions and put on dry face, moisterize, then rinse off. Skin felt fresh and soft. I liked this over the moisturizer in the same brand I bought as well. I would purchase this again
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: It’s great for people with dry skin
customer_reviews.text: It’s great for people with dry skin . Will remove all the dirt at once . The best part is that it won’t let your skin dry too much
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek P.

customer_reviews.title: Great Milk Wash!
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight, fragrance and non-foaming aspects of this face wash. I’ve found that milk washes are so much better for my aging skin and this one is great!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Agramonte

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product so much, it leaves my skin soft and hydrated. Lo recomiendo por que deja mi piel suave y humectada.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA SAUCEDA

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This has a refreshing smell; however it doesn’t lather or foam like I would have hoped
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Makes your face feel so soft
customer_reviews.text: I tried this face wash because my son’s girlfriend brought it over. I was thinking it was going to be just like any other face wash, but boy was I wrong! I love this face wash! It makes your skin feel so soft. I love this so much that I’ve bought the moisturizing face/ neck lotion.
customer_reviews.author: S. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Leaves a film on face
customer_reviews.text: Leaves what feels to be a soft film on my skin and doesn’t leave it feeling clean.
customer_reviews.author: R&A

customer_reviews.title: Great for Sensitive Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and on the dry side. This is a great cleanser for sensitive skin and won't dry out the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Linda v.

customer_reviews.title: good price
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed being able to buy this online and for such a good price. I was paying double at Ulta !!! It worked so well at cleaning off my makeup and bringing more life to my skin after wearing heavy makeup or light makeup !
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Torres

customer_reviews.title: Same price as in stores
customer_reviews.text: Given amazon free delivery this one is fairly priced and convenient at times like this.
customer_reviews.author: C Goodwill

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser
customer_reviews.text: Gentle but effective cleanser with nice light scent, I really like it and will reorder as I haven't found it in stores
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love I love I love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing I use it almost every week it’s the best
customer_reviews.author: Nayesha

customer_reviews.title: Creamy, doesn’t clean well.
customer_reviews.text: It’s meh. I feel like it doesn’t really clean my face, especially if I had makeup on that day even if I use a makeup wipe beforehand.
customer_reviews.author: tinadj

customer_reviews.title: Good cleanser
customer_reviews.text: After washing my face with this cleanser it leaves my skin soft and hydrated
customer_reviews.author: Mireida

customer_reviews.title: recommend
customer_reviews.text: really good, my face is very dry and this product work with my problem
customer_reviews.author: yinette calixto

customer_reviews.title: Great daily face wash
customer_reviews.text: Gentle, moisturizing, and the scent is wonderful. My skin is dry and sensitive, and I don't get that tight sensation after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I find that it doesn't remove makeup as well as I would like so now I use dove soap first
customer_reviews.text: Very gentle cleanser, doesn't irritate my skin and leaves my skin hydrated after. I find that it doesn't remove makeup as well as I would like so now I use dove soap first, then use this after. One pump is enough too so I know the product will last me pretty long.
customer_reviews.author: Ayesha Dawes

customer_reviews.title: Best face wash
customer_reviews.text: Best wash I’ve ever used. Leaves skin feeling moisturized every time.
customer_reviews.author: Kia

customer_reviews.title: Great face wash
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash keeps your skin soft, clean, and never dry
customer_reviews.author: melanie ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just received it in. Make my face so smooth. I will definitely be getting again.
customer_reviews.author: Valentino V

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well and smells great.
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product. It cleans well and gentle on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Gouge

customer_reviews.title: Leaves my face clean but not dry
customer_reviews.text: I just love the smoothness yet my face is super clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: pure perfection
customer_reviews.text: i use this everyday and its a blessing from the lord. get your glow on sis
customer_reviews.author: Calum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This smells great and makes your skin feel nice and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kosman

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes it leaves a almost thin film that makes you want to exfoliate after using it.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy Gutowski

customer_reviews.title: Me likey
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would lather.. the creaminess was interesting. Something like a face conditioner. Soft scent. Left my face very moisturized and soft. So far no allergic reactions for my senstive skin. That's Major!
customer_reviews.author: Christie H.

customer_reviews.title: Good for Dry Skin
customer_reviews.text: My skin is very dry, and I like this item. It make my skin feel so comfortable, more hydration.
customer_reviews.author: PEISHAN F.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dont like the if leaves on my face after use...
customer_reviews.author: Brandie

customer_reviews.title: Love this face wash
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash !! It leaves my face soft & removes make up great without burning my eyes. Great bargain too.
customer_reviews.author: Randolyn Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Allergy. 🤢
customer_reviews.text: The fragrance seemed to be light and very pleasant. Perfect for my taste. But unfortunately I got allergic to it or something else in this formula. I got nasal and eye discomfort and a heavy head. Even had to wash the face again to get rid of the smell. Actually the moment I started to use it I got a feeling of something toxic and cannot make myself use it anymore. I absolutely do not want to inhale this stuff. It makes me sick. It’s sad because I use to like the brand. But now I cannot use neither Garnier nor L’Oreal because of fragrances they use. There were times when they smell lighter and better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorite skin care products...
customer_reviews.text: I got this Garnier cleansing milk from a store once then haven't been able to find it since. I'm glad I found it on Amazon because it works great to remove my foundation without irritating my combination-sensitive skin. My skin has felt much softer and more balanced since I started using it. I also like the light rose scent. It’s natural and not too strong. I hope they continue to make this stuff because it’s one of my must-have skin care products these days.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: Delicious Face Wash!
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful product. The smell. The feel. The results! It feels like an indulgent treat for your skin. My face keeps getting softer and softer with each use. My only concern is that I'm going to go through the bottle very quickly because I cannot stop using this morning AND night. Even when my skin is clean, I want to slather this on, just to smell the delicious fragrance and feel it on my skin. Considering the price, I am happy to reorder as many times as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Licha

customer_reviews.title: not for me
customer_reviews.text: I don't wear makeup... it takes 2-3 pumps to clean my face...I need to massage it over my face for at least 2 minutes to feel clean. My skin is not as dry after washing comparing to other face washes, however, I am breaking out in cysts. Which are painful, looks horrible, and takes looonnnnggg to heal. Now I only use it to wash my hand. I give 2 stars because it smells nice and a ok hand soap...
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Make the pumps easier to pop!
customer_reviews.text: I can never get the pump to pop properly..but other than that, this stuff is lovely. Its not a deep cleanser so id suggest using micellar water or some other makeup remover before using this if your wearing heavy face makeup, but as gentle moisturizing cleanser this is great. It doesnt lather either, which i had to get used to but now I kinda like.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Beri

customer_reviews.title: Non-Comedogenic...?
customer_reviews.text: I do not know if this product is non-comedogenic and was unable to find out through my research. The only reply i received from my inquiry was from a user who stated, "I think so" not good enough. I discontinued use. Very unfortunate, because i loved everything else about it.
customer_reviews.author: j lav

customer_reviews.title: Not Foaming at All!
customer_reviews.text: Dissapointing. Described as Foaming Face was. Does not foam. Feels like lotioning your skin and I have to use a span bar to was after to get rid of greasy fee so I cannot use it to wash my face buy itself. The facial moisturizer works well.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great moisturizer!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love it! It is creamy, rich, and moisturizing. I use it in the PM and it leaves my skin moisturized, but not sticky. It doesn't have any scent to me, which is great. I also have sensitive skin, and this didn't give me any break outs or irritation. It's a good cleanser for dry skin.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This product leaves an oily film layer on your skin. Your face doesn't feel clean.
customer_reviews.author: pj

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser, awful pump.
customer_reviews.text: Love this face wash but the pumps NEVER work! Doesn't dry or r mosturize really. Just removes makeup & oil w/o drying. But you will have to remove the pumps, they refuse to work on every bottle I've ever had.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s a pass
customer_reviews.text: It smells nice & doesn’t dry out my skin but it doesn’t even begin to take off my makeup & I don’t wear a lot. I use for a second cleanse but still don’t feel like my skin is clean. Won’t repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: DeBe

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: This made my face break out. I was hopeful it wouldn’t as it was described as being for sensitive skin, but As with other products it resulted in a break out. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Scotts

customer_reviews.title: I will be ordering this again
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific hidden Little gem. I love the way my face feels after using this and after my recent surgery I used it to cleanse the surgical area and I'm completely satisfied...
customer_reviews.author: Girlwonder614

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my skin soft and clean
customer_reviews.text: Scent is just right, not overwhelming or too strong, it feels great, keeps my skin clean and fresh, buy again, price great.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Waldrup

customer_reviews.title: Very gentle and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I actually love this face wash. My skin was clean without the dryness. I will definitely be repurchasing this always!
customer_reviews.author: kandice putkoo

customer_reviews.title: Cleansing lotion?
customer_reviews.text: This is like a cleansing lotion. It doesnt foam up and it leaves kind of like a slick film on your face. It removes makeup beautifully but if you like that squeaky clean feel, you'll have to wash with another cleanser afterward. It smells good though.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't Recommend it if u have sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product will remove make up. It doesn't fully remove make up. It's scent it a little too strong. I wouldn't Recommend it if u have sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not for oily skin
customer_reviews.text: This left my face feeling like it had a layer of lotion/oil on it. I need to wash my face with something different after using this.
customer_reviews.author: AS

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The scent is a little strong but as it washes off immediately, it doesn’t bother me. Great for my sensitive eczema prone skin.
customer_reviews.author: torbeans

customer_reviews.title: Soft and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: Good for moisturizing and softening your face in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Number Five

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Feeling Facial Cleanser
customer_reviews.text: This cleanser has the nicest feeling I’ve experienced with this kind of product. It feels and smells so nice it’s in a class of its own. It also cleans effectively. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: mahamilt

customer_reviews.title: Gentle cleanser that removes makeup
customer_reviews.text: I have oily/combination skin that can be dry due to weather/sun exposure. This works great for me. Gentle cleanser and removes makeup. I used it in place of the Garnier cleansing oil that was discontinued.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Good for sensitive and rather dry skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and am in my mid-60s. This works well to cleanse without drying or breaking it out. It is gentle and smells good. Price is very good, too.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara McElroy

customer_reviews.title: Horrible smell, returned.
customer_reviews.text: Only used twice, it smells like Nair and couldn’t stand putting something with that scent on my face.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

product_meta.title: Garnier SkinActive Milk Face Wash with Rose Water, 6.7 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)
product_meta.description:
Size:6.75 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)| Color:Rose Water Naturals Wash

Made with Rose Water, this milk face wash perfectly removes makeup and impurities without stripping skin of its natural moisture barrier. This soothing face wash leaves skin feeling soft, smooth and hydrated. Suitable for all skin types, especially sensitive skin. Best if used with the 3-in-1 Face Moisturizer with Rose Water for Sensitive Skin.

A soothing milk face wash with rose water for sensitive skin, made with 96 percent naturally derived ingredients
This gentle foaming cleanser with rose water soothes and calms skin while effectively removing makeup, dirt and oil in one use
This cleansing milk face wash has a vegan formula and it's made without parabens, dyes, silicones or sulfates
The soothing milk cleanser is suitable for all skin types and will leave skin feeling clean, soft, supple and hydrated
This facial cleanser with rose water for sensitive skin, removes makeup and impurities without stripping skin of its moisture

What does naturally-derived mean? We consider an ingredient to be naturally-derived if it is unchanged from its natural state or has undergone processing yet still retains greater than 50% of its molecular structure from its original natural source. This formula consists of 96% naturally derived ingredients. The remaining ingredients constitute 4% of the formula to ensure sensoriality and preservation.

Introducing a skincare line from Garnier SkinActive formulated with 96% Naturally-Derived Ingredients. This line of moisturizers, cleansers and facial mist products are paraben-free, silicone-free, dye-free and sulfate-free. Soothe, purify and refresh your skin with skincare products formulated with rose water, green tea and aloe juice. The rose water line instantly soothes and comforts skin while gently cleansing and hydrating. This line features a 3-in-1 face moisturizer, a facial mist with rose water and a milk face wash with rose water. The green tea line instantly purifies pores and mattifies skin. This line features a 3-in-1 moisturizer, a deep pore exfoliating face scrub and a deep pore face wash. The aloe juice line instantly refreshes skin. This line features a hydrating 3-in-1 face moisturizer, a cream face wash and a gel cleanser.

Apply milk cleanser to dry skin and then gently massage with fingertips. Rinse off and pat dry. In case of direct eye contact, rinse thoroughly with water.
feature_bullets: A soothing milk face wash with rose water for sensitive skin, made with 96 percent naturally derived ingredients
This gentle foaming cleanser with rose water soothes and calms skin while effectively removing makeup, dirt and oil in one use
This cleansing milk face wash has a vegan formula and it's made without parabens, dyes, silicones or sulfates
The soothing milk cleanser is suitable for all skin types and will leave skin feeling clean, soft, supple and hydrated
This facial cleanser with rose water for sensitive skin, removes makeup and impurities without stripping skin of its moisture
